snippet.title: Stones of Solace - Trailer
snippet.description:
Stones of Solace is a minimalistic and contemplative ritual, offering you a quiet space for relaxation. Find out what your idol is every day, and take some of your time to craft them a gift.

A game by Dziff & Armel Gibson
Music by Jason Sutherland

Itch : https://dziff.itch.io/stones-of-solace
Steam : https://store.steampowered.com/app/1122880/Stones_of_Solace/
